name: Highstock-Export-CSV
title: Highstock - Export Chart Data To CSV
description: This feature allows the user to export the chart data to a csv file. It is built off of the Export-CSV plugin by Torstein Honsi, but has been modified to work with Highstock. It has the optional ability to convert Highstock's x-Axis data to ISO strings and to include/exclude the 'Navigator' series.
